channel.title: Artificial Intelligence on Franz Louis Cesista
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial Intelligence on Franz Louis Cesista

item.title: Codeball 2018
item.description: My entry for the World Finals of the Russian AI Cup 2018 - Codeball. A 3D physics-aware orchestrator of a pair of bots in a Rocket League-esque soccer game.

item.title: Codewars 2017
item.description: My entry for the World Finals of the Russian AI Cup 2017 - Codewars. A particle swarm-based AI that uses potential flows and fluid mechanics to direct units in a Command-and-Conquer-esque game.
